Class TerrainSwitch

java.lang.Object
com.um_project_golf.Core.Utils.TerrainSwitch
public class TerrainSwitch extends Object
The class responsible for switching the terrain of the game.

  • Method Details

    • terrainSwitch

      public void terrainSwitch(BlendMapTerrain blendMapTerrain, List<Model> tree, TerrainTexture blendMap2)
      Switches the terrain of the game.
      Parameters:
      blendMapTerrain - The new terrain to switch to.
      tree - The tree model to add to the new terrain.
      blendMap2 - The new blend map to use.

    • createTrees

      public void createTrees() throws IOException
      Place the trees on the terrain. Randomly picks a position on the terrain. As long as the position is green
      Throws:
      IOException - If the heightmap image is not found.
